actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 5034 of title 38, United States Code, to increase the number of nursing home beds in each State for war veterans in need of nursing home care.

summary.text: Increases the number of nursing home beds in each State for war veterans in need of nursing home care to two and one-half beds per thousand war veteran population. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 5034)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5034 of title 38, United States Code, to increase the number of nursing home beds in each State for war veterans in need of nursing home care.
